name: My Original Stories
description:
My Original Stories puts YOU in control of what happens next. Be the center of your own romance, drama, adventure or comedy story. Does Angela go on that blind date? Can you help Allison save the ER patient? What crazy adventure will you get into with Francois and Sally?

* See your favorite characters in a new light and explore their past, present and future
* Make big decisions that will change the lives of our characters FOREVER
* Explore stories with multiple different endings
* Get new stories EVERY MONTH!

Building off of GameHouse's massive catalog of characters and stories, My Original Stories brings you all-new adventures with your favorite characters like Emily O'Malley, Angela Napoli, Allison Heart and so many more.
